attributes.additional_details:
The British Government should undertake the following:

1) Open criminal investigation into FIFA and FA over world cup bidding processes.

2) Pressure FA and UEFA (via EU) to Boycott both Russian and Qatar World Cups due to Corruption issues and human rights abuses in both states.

3) Pressure FA and UEFA to withdraw all funding from FIFA until root and branch reform is carried out.

Football should belong to the people of all countries not just the elite at the top of FIFA, UEFA and other National FA's. Its time to take the game back.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association.
